fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Recurve Bow__
Free 3-star weapon, lots of HP%. 
__Silvershower Heartstrings__
Best weapon, as it is her signature. However, too niche to recommend.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Favonius Warbow, Elegy for the End__
General bows exchanging additional healing for team-wide support.

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Rebound Hydrotherapy
**N/A)** Elemental Burst: Super Saturated Syringing
**N/A)** Normal Attack: Targeted Treatment

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: If __Favonius Warbow__ is used, it is recommended to built CRIT Rate on substats. __Sacrificial Bow__ is  not particularly great on her, despite enabling another usage of her elemental skill, unless running her with C1+ Neuvillette.
